rules.description: Change spacebar to hyper. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change left_option to left_option. (Post _ if pressed alone)

manipulators.description: Change caps_lock to command+control(hyper3).(Post caps_lock if pressed alone)
Finder C-y paste by move(similiar of C-x, C-v on window)
Finder hyper2-v paste by move(similiar of C-x, C-v on window)
iterm ctrl-f3 switch to emacs emacs
Xcode ctrl-return open in external editor
